Arcadia-Solutions/Dasharr

Dashboard for tracking torrent indexer usage stats

View on index

Related repos

  • Self-hosted torrent tracker and site framework, built with Rust and Vue
  • proxy for torrent indexers, connects apps like Sonarr and Radarr
  • Dashboard for website traffic statistics and monitoring
  • dashboard for Plex, Jellyfin, Radarr, Sonarr, UniFi, more
  • web UI for managing and monitoring multiple torrent clients
  • collects and ships system metrics with plugins
  • Terminal time tracker with charts
  • Grafana: open source tool for dashboards, metrics, data visualization, and alerting from various sources
  • Prometheus exporter for Elasticsearch metrics
